::FireBlade::
"Copy..over and out.." He looked back up at Sinnertwin..."Drop me off 
into the water a few hundred meters off shore"

Yanshosh@... wrote:

> Oops, sorry.
> 
> ::Autofire::
> 
> Autofire recieves both of Fireblade's transmissions at the same time.
> He looks around. They were nearing the Alliance base.
> 
> "Allright, but don't be detected," he replies. He looks at Alliance
> island as it comes into view. Hopefully the Alliance wouldn't fire on
> them.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
>  > ::FireBlade::
>  > ::FireBlade looked down at the water below him "Such a wierd planet
>  > with all this water..." he said aloud but mainly to himself..."and
> all
>  > this carbon life forms."  He looked back up and judging by the maps
>  > uploaded to his memory banks by SwitchBlade figured he was that they
>  > were nearing the shore....he couldn't wait to get his feet on dry
> land
>  > again.  He opened up a comm link to the assualt commander,
> Autofire. "
>  > i would like permission to go solo once we hit shore...I will travel
>  > behind the base and use my camouflauge skill to blend in the
>  > surrounding area...Once you get the signal to attack i can either
> come
>  > help from around the base.....or cut my way through the base...maybe
>  > picking up so valuable information on the way"::
